text: "Black Sun" is a 2015 song by Death Cab for Cutie and is the lead single from their eighth studio album Kintsugi. It went to number 12 on the Billboard Hot Rock & Alternative songs chart and number 19 on the Canadian Rock chart. ==References== Category:2015 songs Category:Indie rock songs Category:Death Cab for Cutie songs
title: Black Sun (Death Cab for Cutie song)
